content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a court case in the municipal court zlatar the case started on october 8 2021 and lasted for 9 months the final resolution is that a coowned property consisting of a house and yard will be sold at a public auction the obtained amount will be distributed among the parties according to their ownership shares the court conducted an onsite inspection and involved experts to determine the best method of division but the parties did not reach an agreement so the property will be sold
